description: Microsoft is bringing the Linux 'sudo' feature to Windows Server 2025, offering a new way for admins to elevate privileges for console applications. [...]
title: Microsoft is bringing the Linux sudo command to Windows Server

description: Four vulnerabilities collectively called "Leaky Vessels" allow hackers to escape containers and access data on the underlying host operating system. [...]
title: Leaky Vessels flaws allow hackers to escape Docker, runc containers
